name: Grab the Notes!
description:
Help your heroes to discover their music destiny. Grab the notes and run away using portals across randomly generated stages. And remember: in every level you have less time!!!

Choosing your destiny

Features:
Game taking place on dynamic two-dimensional array
Every game is different, because of randomly generated stages
Three levels of difficulty and custom mode
Three time modes
Two different heroes
Flexible structure - you can adjust every detail - length and width of board, time etc.
Every level is different

Author: Marcin Jozwik 2015
